common_left_pane_title:
"Digital identity is the passport to the
virtual world, where convenience and
connectivity effortlessly intertwine."
credentials_right_pane_bottom_paragraph_:
Please click the button to store your credential.
Go back to this screen afterwards to continue

Click on the button
to receive your credential

Click the button
to receive your credential.
credentials_right_pane_bottom_paragraph:
Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR
scanner to accept and store your credential.
credentials_right_pane_top_paragraph:
Let's add a {{credentialName}} Credential
to your wallet.
credentials_success_right_pane_paragraph:
Your {{credentialName}} credential has been
successfully issued to you.

You can use it to verify your identity whenever you
interact with other parties.
credentials_success_right_pane_verified_:
The {{credentialName}} credential proofs that UnifiedPost
has been able to verify that you have access to the  e-mail address you provided.

You can use this credential to login to your UnifiedPost account.
credentials_success_right_pane_valid_id_:
The {{credentialName}} credential proofs that
UnifiedPost has been able to verify that you have a valid ID document
and that you are linked to this valid ID document.

You can use this credential to manage your UnifiedPost account.
credentials_success_right_pane_registere:
The {{credentialName}} credential proofs that
UnifiedPost has been able to verify that your company is a registered company.

You can use this credential to transact your UnifiedPost account.
credential_verify_request_right_pane_top:
In order to issue a credential we need to get
some information from your wallet.
credential_verify_request_right_pane_bot: By scanning this QR code with your Banqup app

Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR
scanner to provide information.

Please click the button to open a wallet
Go back to this screen afterwards to continue.

Click on the button 
to start sharing your information with us.
download_app_right_pane_paragraph:
Please download one of the below DDIP
compliant SSI Wallets if you haven't yet
onboarding_left_card_paragraph:
When you opt to manually enter your data,
please fill in your first- and lastname, along
with your email address to get the
{{credentialName}} credential(s)
onboarding_right_card_paragraph:
Choose to share your data via your wallet.
It's a quick method to provide the
information to get the

{{credentialName}} credential(s)
qrcode_right_pane_bottom_paragraph:
Simply scan the QR code using
your wallet's QR scanner.
mobile_right_pane_bottom_paragraph: Open your wallet app by clicking the 'Open in wallet' button.
qrcode_right_pane_top_paragraph:
A hassle-free way to share your personal
information using your digital wallet.
sharing_data_right_pane_paragraph:
Almost there!
 Please fill out any missing data.
To claim your {{credentialName}}
credential(s). The content will not be stored! It is used to personalize the credentials
sharing_data_fill_out_right_pane_paragra: To get started, please provide us with your details
sharing_data_fill_out_right_pane_banqup_: You shared the following information with us. Please verify if this is correct.
sharing_data_company_fill_out_right_pane: Please fill in and review your company details.
manual_fill_data_company_right_pane_titl: Tell us more about your company
sharing_data_success_right_pane_paragrap:
for providing the information. We are now ready

ssi_information_request_page_form_terms_: I agree to the terms & conditions
coc_sharing_data_right_pane_top_paragrap: Almost there! Please provide any missing details if necessary.
coc_credential_verify_request_right_pane: Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR scanner. When you already on your phone open your wallet by clicking on the Open in wallet button.
ssi_credentials_landing_page_text: You can receive the credentials below in your wallet. Select a credential and follow the necessary steps.
title_fill_5_digits: Fill in the 5-digit code from the confirmation e-mail.
paragraph_add_credential: Let's add the credential to your wallet
paragraph_add_credential_notaris: Let's add the {{credentialName}} credential to your wallet.
paragraph_scan_this_qr:
Scan this QR code with your mobile wallet's QR code scanner. 
Or enter the address of your web wallet to open your web wallet.
paragraph_scan_this_qr_notaris:
Scan this QR code using your wallet's QR
 scanner to accept and store your credential.
paragraph_confirm_email: Confirm your account by entering the 5 digit confirmation code from the email.
loading_verify_information_description: Please wait, you will automatically go to the next step.
welcome_page_confirm_account_subtitle: We’ll first need to confirm your account
welcome_page_confirm_identity_subtitle: We would like to know a bit more about you
welcome_page_confirm_account_description: Confirm your account by providing some information and by replying to the verification e-mail we’ll sent.
welcome_page_confirm_identity_descriptio:
Next steps:
1. Provide some personal information
2. Upload a valid ID
3. Perform a liveliness check
4. Wait for confirmation
paragraph_add_named_credential: It's now possible to add this credential to your wallet.
belastingdienst_landing_page_text:
You can receive the credentials below in your wallet.
Select a credential and follow the necessary steps.
belastingdienst_invullen: To begin, please fill in the following information
vismayuki_landing_page_description: Through this demo you can be asked for various credentials. Choose an option.
vismayuki_verify_top_title: We would like to receive 1 or more credentials from you
vismayuki_verify_bottom_description:
Scan this QR code with your mobile wallet's QR code scanner. 
Or enter your web wallet address to open your web wallet.
vismayuki_share_success_top_title: bedankt voor het insturen van de informatie
